medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 24 hour history of worsening abdominal pain. Initial pain started in the lower abdomen and progressed to sharp, severe pain that awoke her from sleep. The pain has since become more diffuse. She reports daily nausea and vomiting since a recent left total knee arthroplasty and has not had a bowel movement since then, despite using suppositories and enemas. She admits to chills but has no fevers, and denies any bright red blood per rectum (BRBPR) or melena prior.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HTN, Hypothyroidism, osteoarthritis, seasonal allergies, GERD, hepatitis
